alert.note: Alert for Lower Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Plaquemines Parish through NOON CDT... At 1129 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Venice, or 32 miles southeast of Port Sulphur. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boothville-venice, Boothville, Venice and Boothville Asos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. A funnel could briefly touchdown over the marsh as a waterspout. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
